'Play' is an abstract sculpture by Lars Jonker. Greiff, Glory-June:
"Remembrance, Faith & Fancy; Outdoor Public Sculpture in Indiana", pages 79,
176. Indiana Historical Society Press, 2005. It is located in Hendricks
Park, which is south of downtown Indianapolis, Indiana.
